original_text: Joshua was wearing very dirty clothes and he stood in front of the angel.
korean_text: 여호수아가 더러운 옷을 입고 천사 앞에 서 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Joshua was wearing very dirty clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아는 매우 더러운 옷을 입고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and he stood in front of the angel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 천사 앞에 서 있었다
